text: falamaa qadayna ealaa sulayman balmwt ma dll aljini ealaa mawtih 'iilaa alaradat takul easah alty kan mtkyana elyha, fawaqae sulayman ealaa alard, eind dhlk ealimt aljini 'anahum law kanuu yaelamun alghayb ma 'aqamuu fi aleadhab almdhll waleamal alshaq lslyman; zanana minhum 'anah min alahya'. wafi alayat 'ibtal laetqad bed alnaas 'an aljini yaelamun alghyb; 'iidh law kanuu yaelamun alghayb lelmu wafat sulayman ealayh alslam, walamaa 'aqamuu fi aleadhab almhyn
